ROM.Changelog: ### Changelog 20160104 * Introduced Happy New Year Surprise * Introduced MaxiTweaks in build.prop * Introduced Translates to Spanish in Settings * Launch SuperSU from Settings * Fix FC Settings by OTA * Updated OTA Updater to 2.6 * Add support smartcover * Update NFC * Update android-5.1.1_r30 * Remove Wheatley (Causes the cell is restarted) * Add Toast Animation * Update sources * And more!
